DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect PF-06743649 lowering serum uric acid subject suffer gout follow 14 day dosing , well assess safety tolerability .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy , Safety And Tolerability Of PF-06743649 In Gout Subjects .
DOC.criteria: Subject meet diagnosis gout per American Rheumatism Association Criteria Classification acute Arthritis Primary Gout . Subjects take urate lower therapy time screen must willing discontinue prior urate lower therapy time Screening Visit 1 completion study period Day 16 . Subjects take urate lower therapy time screen must serum urate level > = 8.0 mg/dL time second screening visit . Subjects NOT take urate lower therapy time screen must serum urate level > = 8.0 mg/dL screen visit 1 2 . Positive medical history current evidence medical psychiatric condition/disease , ECG laboratory abnormality may increase risk associate study participation investigational product administration may interfere interpretation study result , judgment Investigator , would make subject inappropriate entry study . Chronic kidney disease classify moderate severe ( Clinical Practice Guideline , National Kidney Foundation ) 12 ; GFR < 60 mL/min/1.73m2 calculate CockcroftGault equation . Subjects current tophaceous gout . Gout flare resolve least 2 week prior randomization .
